name: Microbe
description:
Summary:

You control a nanite that you have somehow gotten into your worst enemy. This marvel of technology functions off of cell scraps and slowly depletes when left on, too bad you forgot to put an off switch. You can use your precious energy to fabricate gas pellets and leave them behind to take out the antibodies that are after you. See how many you can take out before you have to send in another nanite!

Controls:

Arrow keys - Movement

Z- Drop a Poison pellet

Version: 1.1

- Added audio to the game

- Changed attack key

Note:

This is my first creation with my toolset for Ludum Dare 33, and I hope to learn more about it before the start of the competition.
